text: I would like to generate a content item that is frequently used from a HubDB table to make life easier for the editors. The content in question contains a CTA. Is there anyway of doing that from a HubDB table? For exampe, by using a column to store the CTA embed code and then placing the embed code in the module html. Will that work OK – has anyone done this before?
I suppose I can copy the guid to a column and use this function: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#cta>
